title: Ariel Winter flaunts derriere in thong bikini throwback
text: Share this article Share As she wrapped her legs around the 29-year-old actor's waist, she gave a close-up of her backside, which her scant bikini bottoms barely contained. The two-piece swimsuit featured a ruffled hemline and intricate white patterns splattered across a blue field. Loved up: Romance rumors emerged last November after Ariel, 19, and Levi, 29, spent a sun-soaked holiday together in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico Chowing down: Ariel took to Snapchat and showed Levi in the same blue swimming trunks from her throwback as he stood in a kitchen, munching a plateful of the local cuisine Her shoulder-length raven tresses were sopping wet as she shared a smooch with her hunky boyfriend. Photos posted to the award-winning starlet's Snapchat account during their trip shows the beauty in the skimpy swimwear. Ariel - who has been open about embracing her new body after undergoing breast reduction surgery from a 32F to 32D in 2015 - looked relaxed while flashing the peace sign in a selfie from their trip. Sheer beauty! Ariel has never been shy about showing off all her best assets as she donned a see-through gown at the Screen Actors Guild Awards on January 29 In another image, Ariel showed Levi in the same blue swimming trunks from her throwback as he stood in a kitchen, munching a plateful of the local cuisine. While Ariel and Levi enjoyed their sun-soaked holiday together, the couple's relationship was finally confirmed when they were spotted kissing weeks later. Levi is best known for his role on the 2016 TV series Aftermath and for his part in the Netflix original series The Killing. Red carpet romance: Ariel was beaming as she proudly posed with the Aftermath actor Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
